member.name: T:AgeCalculator.Age
member.summary: Represents class to hold years, months, days and time information.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.Years
member.summary: Gets the years component of the class.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.Months
member.summary: Gets the months component of the class.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.Days
member.summary: Gets the days component of the class.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.Time
member.summary: Gets the time component of the class.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.TotalDays
member.summary: Gets the value of the current class expressed in whole and fractional days.
member.returns: The total number of days represented by this instance.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.TotalHours
member.summary: Gets the value of the current class expressed in whole and fractional hours.
member.returns: The total number of hours represented by this instance.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.TotalMinutes
member.summary: Gets the value of the current class expressed in whole and fractional minutes.
member.returns: The total number of minutes represented by this instance.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.TotalSeconds
member.summary: Gets the value of the current class expressed in whole and fractional seconds.
member.returns: The total number of seconds represented by this instance.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.TotalMilliseconds
member.summary: Gets the value of the current class expressed in whole and fractional milliseconds.
member.returns: The total number of milliseconds represented by this instance.

member.name: P:AgeCalculator.Age.Ticks
member.summary: Gets the number of ticks that represent the value of the current class.
member.returns: The number of ticks contained in this instance.

member.name: M:AgeCalculator.Age.#ctor(System.DateTime,System.DateTime,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and calculates the age between the specified dates.
member.param: A boolean flag indicating whether February 28th of a non-leap year is considered the end of 1-year cycle for a leapling. By default it is false.
member.returns: An instance of class containing years, months, days and time information.
member.exception: Thrown when is considered greater than .
